questions.text: What immediately follows completing the JotForm Enrollment with the client?

options.B: Zapier saves a PDF to the client’s Drive folder and creates tracking records
options.D: A billing record is created in ProviderOne

questions.explanation: Automation creates the Monday.com record and saves the completed Enrollment PDF to Drive.

questions.text: Which system is used to verify Medicaid status and obtain the ProviderOne ID?
questions.explanation: Eligibility verification occurs in ProviderOne via OneHealthPort.

questions.text: Where is the client tracked after intake submission?

options.A: FCS Client Roster in Monday.com (Intake Processing group)

questions.explanation: The roster organizes clients in the Intake Processing group for next steps.

questions.text: If Medicaid is inactive, which action is correct?

options.A: Set AH Intake to Medicaid Inactive and notify the case manager via automation

questions.explanation: The process notifies the case manager and delays enrollment until coverage resumes.

questions.text: Setting Intake Status to Eligible triggers what action?

options.B: Zapier submits SH and SE assessments online and stores confirmations

questions.explanation: Automation submits online assessments and saves PDFs and confirmation numbers.

questions.text: Where do you confirm that SH/SE statuses changed to Submitted with confirmation numbers?
questions.explanation: The Enrollment Review view consolidates submission statuses and confirmations.

questions.text: A denial from Wellpoint triggers which notification?
questions.explanation: Zapier posts a summary to the Slack #admin channel when a denial is received.

questions.text: What data from ProviderOne must be copied into Monday.com?
questions.explanation: ProviderOne ID and the listed county are entered to complete eligibility review.
